**This complainant already has a signature on file with us. Below is the latest email request:
ATTN: Google, Inc.

Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA, [private], USA
Fax: [private]

FROM:[private]

Tibettrip.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. 
[private]
[private]
Xi'an, Shaanxi, [private] P.R.C.
Tel: [private]

Fax: [private]
E-mail: [private]@gmail.com

SUBJ: Copyright infringement 
DATE: September 28, 2007

Dear Google, Inc. 

1. I, the webmaster of 
www.tibettrip.com, am on behalf of our company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. I am looking forward for your concerns about the websites copied the below pages from our website. 

The offender is 
en.tibettour.com.cn. They copied 28 pages of contents from our website without our permission. So we are here to ask for your investigation and removal of the infringing pages from your search result. 

2. Hereunder is the detailed information on the pages they have copied from our website: 


(1)Search Query “Bon tibettour”  
Our Copyrighted Page: 
http://web.archive.org/web/20020228013909/http://tibettrip.com/features/religion/bon.htm

(our February 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://en.tibettour.com.cn/custom/..%5Ccustom/20040200443095816.htm
 

(2)Search Query “Tibet Buddhism custom tibettour”  
Our Copyrighted Page: 
http://web.archive.org/web/20020415105803/http://tibettrip.com/features/buddhism.htm

(our April 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://en.tibettour.com.cn/custom/..%5Ccustom/200402004430100007.htm

(3)Search Query “Tibet Buddhism tibettour”

Our Copyrighted Page: 
http://web.archive.org/web/20020415105803/http://tibettrip.com/features/buddhism.htm   
(our April 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page: 
http://en.tibettour.com.cn/introduction/..%5Cintroduction/20040200442885210.htm

(4) Search Query “Reincarnation System tibettour” 

Our Copyrighted Page: 
http://web.archive.org/web/20020415105142/http://tibettrip.com/features/religion/reincarnation.htm
   (our April 2002 version)

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/custom/..%5Ccustom/200402004430100040.htm 

(5) Search Query “Dalai lama and Panchen lama tibettour”  

Our Copyrighted Page: 
http://web.archive.org/web/20020228012352/http://tibettrip.com/features/panchen.htm   
(our February 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page: 
http://en.tibettour.com.cn/custom/..%5Ccustom/200402004430100104.htm

(6) Search Query “Buddhism Figures tibettour”

http://web.archive.org/web/20020415104029/http://tibettrip.com/features/figures.htm  
(our April 2002 version)

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/custom/..%5Ccustom/200402004430100138.htm

(17) Search Query “Tibetan religious symbols tibettour”
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20020228132340/http://tibettrip.com/features/religion/symbols.htm
  (our February 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://en.tibettour.com.cn/custom/..%5Ccustom/200402004513170607.htm      (Except the content from ‘Swastika is the second most’ to ‘in their daily life’, they copied our entire content.)


(18) Search Query “Mountain Sickness tibettour”
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20020607152400/http://tibettrip.com/essential/altitude.htm

(our June 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://en.tibettour.com.cn/essentials/..%5Cessentials/20040200458175437.htm
   (From the second paragraph on, they copied our entire content.)

(19) Search Query “Generally altitude over 3,000 meters (9,843 feet) is defined as high altitude tibettour”

http://web.archive.org/web/20020607152400/http://tibettrip.com/essential/altitude.htm
(our June 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://en.tibettour.com.cn/health/200402004430160348.htm
   (Content of their second to fourth paragraphs copied our third, fourth, first and second paragraphs respectively.)

(20) Search Query “Other Health Concerns tibettour”

included.’)

(our December 2001 version)

(our June 2002 version)

(our December 2001 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://en.tibettour.com.cn/shopping/..%5Cshopping/200402004525164219.htm
   (Their first four paragraphs copied our entire content.)

(24) Search Query “2004020045980820 tibettour”
Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20011226020424/http://tibettrip.com/essential/shopping.htm
(our December 2001 version)
Infringing Web Page: 

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/essentials/..%5Cessentials/2004020045980820.htm  (Their first four paragraphs copied our entire content.)

(25) Search Query “Food tibettour”
Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20021208041004/http://www.tibettrip.com/essential/food_drink.htm
(our December 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/essentials/2004020045980922.htm    (Their content from fourth paragraph on copied our entire content.)

(26) Search Query “Traditional Tibetan food consists mainly of barley tibettour”   (See ‘repeat the search with the omitted results 
included.’)
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20021208041004/http://www.tibettrip.com/essential/food_drink.htm

(our December 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://en.tibettour.com.cn/News/..%5Cnews/..%5Cnews/200402005811165913.htm
    (Their content from fourth paragraph on copied our entire content.)

(27) Search Query “Traditional Tibetan food consists mainly of barley tibettour”   (See ‘repeat the search with the omitted results 
included.’)
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20021208041004/http://www.tibettrip.com/essential/food_drink.htm

(our December 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://en.tibettour.com.cn/news/..%5Cnews/200402005811165913.htm    (Their content from fourth paragraph on copied our entire content.)


(28) Search Query “Travel Alerts tibettour”

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/advisories/..%5Cadvisories/200402004510143302.htm
    (Their content of Before Visit to Tibet copied our third and fourth paragraphs while content of their Altitude Sickness copied our first and second paragraphs.)

3. My contact information:
 [private]

 [private]@gmail.com
www.tibettrip.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
[private]
[private]

Xi'an, Shaanxi, [private], P.R.C.

4. The contact info of the copyright offender en.tibettour.com.cn is:
   Email: [private]@tibet.cn

Tel: [private]
Fax: [private]

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing web page is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.


6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.


Thank you very much!

Yours sincerely,

[private]

Ps.: According to your instruction, all our copyright complaint can be sent to you only via email. Please refer to our faxed document to you on July 6th, 2007.
